card-generator.description: is a desktop application for creating and generating custom cards. Using Excel spreadsheets and customizable fxml templates, you can quickly create entire sets of cards without having to design each card individually

text1.description2: You enter all the data, such as name, power, description and special features, into Excel, and the application automatically generates professionally designed cards based on your fxml template. You can export the finished cards as png images or download the entire set as a pdf file
text1.description3: is designed with an intuitive user interface, real time visual preview, and full control over element layout. Projects and templates are stored locally, ensuring privacy and reliability while working

text2.description: Create themed board game kits and prototypes quickly, efficiently, and fully customized

text3.benefits1: Excel based data input for automatic card generation
text3.benefits3: Export cards as png images or as a pdf file

card-generator.title: Card Generator

cookie-notice.message: This website uses cookies to analyze and improve your user experience. By continuing to use the site, you agree to the use of cookies

not-found.title: Lost in Space

smoking-tracker.description: is an easy to use smoking tracking app that helps you understand your habits and progress towards quitting. Every cigarette you smoke is clearly recorded, giving you detailed insight into your daily, weekly and monthly patterns

text1.description2: The app allows you to visualize your data through weekly, monthly, and yearly graphs, so you can quickly identify your habits. Based on this data, you can make more informed decisions about how to reduce or control the number of cigarettes you smoke
text1.description3: All data is stored locally on your device, ensuring privacy and security. If desired, you can also enable automatic backups to keep your data safe even when you change devices. The application supports multilingualism and is available in Slovenian and English, with an intuitive user interface that is friendly to both beginners and advanced users
text1.description4: In addition to tracking and visualizing your progress, the app helps you understand long term trends and smoking patterns, which is key to planning changes and achieving your goals. Simply tracking your daily consumption gives you better control over your habits

text2.description: Download the app today and start tracking your consumption!

text3.benefits1: Local data storage for greater privacy
text3.benefits2: Daily, monthly and yearly statistics with graphs
text3.benefits4: Multi language support: English and Slovenian

smoking-tracker.title: Smoking Tracker
